message.content:
cs.LO, cs.PL, cs.DS, cs.FL, cs.SE. 

The paper deals with termination of programs and reduction relations, which are topics in logic (cs.LO) and programming languages (cs.PL). The use of well-founded relations and the mention of primitive recursive functions suggest a connection to computability theory (cs.DS). The algorithm mentioned in the abstract also involves searching for a transition invariant, which is a common technique in formal verification (cs.FL). Finally, the mention of a language designed by Podelski and Rybalchenko suggests a connection to software engineering (cs.SE).
